title: can't load/use regular-use webpages on v134.0.2?
content:
Since updating to v134.0.2 (win 11) parts of webpages I routinely use will not display/function properly. Generally, the websites crash/fail to display information and/or forms will not submit; I can click the button but no action occurs. This isn't consistent across webpages, but it is consistent on the pages where I experience the issue. I have tried:

  • Bulleted list itemclearing my browser history/cookies/cache (obviously)
  • Bulleted list itemdisabling/uninstalling my extensions
  • Bulleted list itemstarting ff in troubleshoot mode
  • Bulleted list itemdouble checking that my firewall still permitted ff to run after the update (per a '22 help article)
  • Bulleted list itemuninstalling/reinstalling my vpn to ensure that wasn't randomly interacting badly (it's been fine to date)

Pretty much everything short of a complete reinstall, which i really don't want to do (exporting all my bookmarks sounds like a major headache; i'd almost rather switch browsers until firefox updates again and pray that fixes it, haha). None of these made any difference; anybody have advice??

Thanks!!
creator: chimneymice
